extension_description.message: This extension allows you to easily search for translations of phrases in English and Polish.

menu_page_path.description: The path to the localized menu page.

update_page_path.description: The path to the localized update page.

dictionary_com.description: The name visible on the dictionary choice list for Dictionary.com.

merriam_webster.description: The name visible on the dictionary choice list for Merriam-Webster.

diki.description: The name visible on the dictionary choice list for Diki.

usage_info.message: To view definitions double click on a phrase while holding the ALT key.

release_notes.description: Release notes on the update page.

version_0_1_1_note.message: The key to hold while looking up a phrase has been change from CTRL to ALT. Preserving priorly chosen dictionary has been fixed.

version_0_1_2_note.message: The extension has been adjusted to be able to work with Google Chrome.

version_0_1_3_note.message: Polish translation of the interface and release notes has been added. Styling has been improved.
